alert.note: Alert for Logan; Oklahoma (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 14 at 2:18PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Oklahoma and southern Logan Counties through 315 PM CDT... At 218 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 5 miles northwest of Edmond, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Northwestern Edmond, Guthrie, Cedar Valley, Navina, and Seward. This includes Interstate 35 between mile markers 146 and 159. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
